statements: SELECT * FROM accounts_tracing;
SELECT account_name, amount FROM accounts_tracing WHERE account_type = 'Savings';
SELECT id, account_name FROM accounts_tracing WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_name, amount FROM accounts_tracing ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM accounts_tracing WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM accounts_tracing WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT account_name, amount FROM accounts_tracing WHERE account_type = 'Savings' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_accounts, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM accounts_tracing;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM accounts_tracing WHERE account_type = 'Checking';
SELECT account_name, account_type FROM accounts_tracing WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY account_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM accounts_payable;
SELECT vendor_name, amount FROM accounts_payable WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT invoice_number, vendor_name FROM accounts_payable ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM accounts_receivable WHERE amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, amount, invoice_number FROM accounts_receivable;
SELECT * FROM accounts_payable WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT invoice_number, amount, vendor_name FROM accounts_payable WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM accounts_receivable WHERE invoice_number='INV-001';
SELECT customer_name, amount FROM accounts_receivable WHERE amount < 5000 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, amount FROM accounts_payable WHERE amount BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM accounts_payable ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT id, amount FROM accounts_receivable WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT id, amount, date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT vendor_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM accounts_payable GROUP BY vendor_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM accounts_payable ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, amount FROM accounts_receivable WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT id, vendor_id, amount FROM accounts_payable WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Purchase' AND amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, amount, date FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM accounts_payable;
SELECT vendor_name, amount FROM accounts_payable WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT vendor_name, amount, due_date FROM accounts_payable WHERE due_date < '2023-06-30';
SELECT vendor_name, amount FROM accounts_payable ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments_made WHERE payment_amount < 5000;
SELECT * FROM accounts_payable ORDER BY due_date DESC, amount ASC;
SELECT id, vendor_name, amount FROM accounts_payable WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT vendor_name, amount FROM accounts_payable WHERE due_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM payments_made JOIN accounts_payable ON payments_made.vendor_id = accounts_payable.id;
SELECT customer_name, payment_amount FROM payments_received WHERE payment_amount >= 500 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM accounts_payable;
SELECT id, vendor_name, amount FROM accounts_receivable;
SELECT amount, customer_name, due_date FROM accounts_payable ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, amount FROM accounts_payable WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, transaction_date, transaction_type, description FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM accounts_payable WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY due_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, amount, due_date FROM accounts_receivable WHERE due_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY amount DESC, customer_name ASC;
SELECT description, transaction_type, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-03-31' ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vendor_name, payment_date, amount FROM payments_made WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY payment_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM payments_received WHERE customer_name = 'CompanyXYZ' ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
